main_definition: Children refer to young human beings who are not yet adults, typically ranging from infancy to adolescence.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In a general sense, 'children' means offspring or descendants of humans
meanings_and_examples.example: 'The children in the neighborhood play together every afternoon.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In idiomatic usage, 'children' can mean young members of an organization or group
meanings_and_examples.example: 'The committee consists of several influential individuals and their children.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: In legal contexts, 'children' may refer to those under the age of majority who are considered minors by law
meanings_and_examples.example: 'As a minor, the children have certain protections and limitations on what they can do.'
